WorkItem.ClosedComment: Looks like the same issue as #12.
WorkItem.Description:
Would be really nice to:

1. Have a dual pane view of TypeScript / JavaScript like MS Web Essentials for CoffeeScript / LESS
2. Compile js on file save or as you type just like the TS playground.
3. Merge TS w/ Web Essentials
WorkItem.Summary: Generate js on save in VS 2012

Comments.Message: Thanks! This is a common request, and we're weighing our options here.

Looks like everything I asked for is in the new Web Essentials.

Very nice. 

Keep up the great work.
